Interests

Creating

I love making things, I always have. Some would see a cross-stitched piece and admire it for it's beauty, I would turn it over to see how it was crafted.

Gardening

This year I tried my hand at growing sweet corn from seed. My grandmother says it's in good shape if it's "knee-high by the fourth of July," and it did indeed reach the proverbial height in time. The pollen has dropped and ears are starting to show, I'm excited to see if we can get a few BBQs from the effort.

Crochet

I've been crocheting for the past few years. I've done hats, blankets, and scarves, but my favorite is little creatures called amigurumi. They're adorable little animals made with many stitches and lots of patience.

Baking

I haven't picked up my offset spatula in awhile, but I do enjoy making sweet treats. From fancy cakes, to no bake cookies, I smile at the idea of tying on my old apron. It looks like my little apple tree might even produce enough fruit to make a pie this year.
